Class DeckClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • DeckClass

  • public class DeckClass
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Default Constructor that automatically creates a deck of cards.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeckClass

        public DeckClass()
        Default Constructor that automatically creates a deck of cards. Uses four for loops to create 13 cards for each suit. Face Cards are represented by 11,12,13,14 for Jack,Queen,King,and Ace respectively.

      • DeckClass

        public DeckClass(java.util.ArrayList<CardClass> anotherDeck)
        Constructor that creates a deck of cards based on an existing array list.
        Parameters:
        ArrayList - Another array list of cards.

      • DeckClass

        public DeckClass(DeckClass copy)
        Copy Constructor for the DeckClass.
        Parameters:
        DeckClass - The object to be copied. Takes the object to be copied and creates a new object based on it.

    • Method Detail

      • dealCard

        public CardClass dealCard()
        A method for dealing a card. This means it is removed from the deck.
        Returns:
        CardClass The card to be dealt.

      • addCard

        public void addCard(CardClass card)
        A method for adding a card back to the deck.
        Parameters:
        CardClass - The card to be added back to the deck.

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        A method for shuffling the deck of cards. Uses a random generated number as the index and swaps each card in succession with another random card in the deck.

      • printDeck

        public void printDeck()
        A method for printing the deck of cards. Simply goes loops through the array list for the deck and prints the value and suit of each card.
